title: Adobe Patches 11 Critical ColdFusion Flaws Amid 30 Total Vulnerabilities Discovered
description: Adobe has released security updates to fix a fresh set of security flaws, including multiple critical-severity bugs in ColdFusion versionsâ€¯2025, 2023 and 2021 that could result in arbitrary file read and code execution.
